body.p: An Oxygen Publishing Template defines all aspects of the layout and styles for WebHelp Responsive output. It is a self-contained customization package stored as a ZIP archive or folder that can easily be shared with others. It provides the primary method for customizing the output.

ul.li: Add additional template resources to customize the output (such as logos, favicons, or CSS files).
Change the layout of the main page or topic pages by customizing which components will be displayed and where they will be positioned in the page.
Extend the default processing by specifying one or more XSLT extension points.
Specify one or more transformation parameters to customize the output.
